caption.p: EAG responses (mV) of male and female antennae of Sitophilus zeamais to compounds dissolved in paraffin oil at 10% (v/v) concentration. Bars indicate the mean Â± standard error. Table inset shows the statistical parameters of two-way ANOVA. The response of the two gender to each compound is compared to those of the control (paraffin oil) (*, p < 0.05; ns, not significant; ANOVA, Dunnett post hoc test).
